climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: Waffle Weave Texture: Classic waffle weave design of the blanket feature puffy and warmth appearance, chic and sophisticated touch. Available in various colors, these distinctive three-dimensional texture blankets will perfectly adds a touch of style to your bedroom complement any home decor. Just add a fresh layer to your bed or sofa with our waffle weave blanket.

Natural Pre-Washed Fabric: Due to the exquisite pre-washed craftsmanship, PHF washed waffle blanket features in excellent softness and safty, can get softer after every wash and stay cozy for years. Breathable, cozy, lightweight, durable, this blanket will meet most of your requirements for a blanket.

All Season Comfort: This blanket can be used in all seasons,making itself a bedding essential in daily life. It is soft, breathable, moisture absorption and proper warm. It's just warm enough to take off the chill but not cause you to sweat in hot days and also a nice added layer without making you burn up in your sleep in cold days.

Versatile Blanket: Not only a bed and sofa blanket, this waffle blanket can be used as a bedspreads or bed layering. It is also suitable for outdoor use like going picnic,travelling, backpacking or just when you nap in your office or carry it in cars. Cats/dogs are NOT recommended to play on the blanket for snagging issues.
Package Includes:1 Pack PHF light khaki/linen washed waffle weave blanket, king size (104"x90"),perfect for bed couch sofa, essential daily use blanket and home decoration.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: We Are PHF: Specializing in designing, producing, and exporting home textile products for customers all around the world, PHF aims to providing extra comfort, relax, beauty with our top-quality and affordable home linens. We are not only selling products, but also promoting a comfortable and refresh life style. PHF- Top Brand of Waffle Bedding Collection: PHF is the top brand of waffle bedding products. Available in various waffle weave design, our ranges of waffle products includes blankets, pillow shams, decorative pillows and duvet covers, etc. Find just the right waffle bedding products from PHF.

Is the key to home happiness a well-chosen blanket? Used when we’re snoozing, watching a movie, or curling up after a long day with a cup of tea, blankets are versatile must-haves in any abode. PHF waffle weave design blanket, crafted entirely from chosen soft fabric, is a lightweight, airy alternative to bulkier blankets that traps heat during the winter and keeps you cool throughout those warm summer months, ensure all year round comfort. Ultra Soft Fabric: PHF waffle blanket brings coziness like home and a personal touch to your personal space. This blanket is ultra soft, breathable and skin-friendly for all people. No worry about any skin irritations. Great for many different occasion needs, such as bedroom, couch, car, office, camping, etc. Exqusite Waffle Weave Pattern: PHF carefully developed waffle weave pattern features puffy and warmth appearance, chic and sophisticated touch, unique structure ensures the air permeability of the blanket, allowing you and your family to enjoy a comfortable sleep all year round. Delicate Craftsmanship: With the ring spun textile techonology, our blanket is designed to be stronger and softer. No wrinkles, shrinkage, pilling or color fading. No thread loosing or fraying. More Decorative: This blanket features textured waffle weave pattern in various colors , which will add a classy and elegant finishing look to your room. More decorative compare to normal regular blankets. Just add a fresh layer to your bed or sofa with our waffle weave blanket!

Ultra Soft & Truly Waffle Weave Unlike those flat and loose waffle blanket, PHF delicate waffle blanket is super soft and cozy, deeply woven into fine and close waffle effect, features thus dimensional and elegant appearance, brings casual sophistication and create a soothing retreat. Neat and Overlocked Edge Neatly woven with“self-finished” edge, our bed blanket will bring you the perfect finishing touch and a reliable straight edge that will not fray. Machine Washable Machine wash separately in cold water, gentle cycle. Do not bleach. Tumble dry on low heat or lay flat to dry. Remove promptly. Warm iron as needed. Because of its unique weaving progress, PHF waffle blanket stays in its original shape without shedding or pilling even after 100+ laundry cycles.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Experience Cozy Bliss With This Blanket!
reviews.reviewText: I recently added the Ultra-Soft Waffle Weave Blanket to my bedding collection, and it’s safe to say that I’ve found my new favorite blanket for ultimate comfort and relaxation.The first thing that struck me about this blanket is its luxurious texture. The waffle weave pattern adds a touch of elegance and sophistication to my bed, and the softness of the fabric is simply irresistible. As soon as I wrapped myself in it, I felt like I was enveloped in a cloud of coziness.The blanket’s generous size ensures that it covers my bed perfectly, providing warmth and comfort throughout the night. It’s lightweight yet incredibly insulating, making it suitable for various seasons. Whether it’s a cool summer evening or a chilly winter night, this blanket is versatile enough to keep me comfortable year-round.One of the standout features of this blanket is its breathability. I don’t overheat while using it, thanks to the waffle weave design that allows for proper airflow. This makes it an excellent choice for those who tend to sleep hot.Durability is also a strong point of this blanket. Despite multiple washes, it maintains its softness and structure. The quality of the stitching and the overall construction is evident, which gives me confidence in its long-lasting performance.The Ultra-Soft Waffle Weave Blanket has become my go-to companion for movie nights, lazy Sunday mornings, and peaceful nights of sleep. Its ability to provide warmth without being heavy, coupled with its elegant design, truly sets it apart.If you’re seeking the perfect blend of style and comfort in a blanket, look no further than the Ultra-Soft Waffle Weave Blanket. Its quality, texture, and cozy factor make it a must-have addition to any home.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been looking for a waffle blanket that reminds me of my childhood. This is thick and sturdy yet light enough for layering. It’s soft and you can’t go wrong with cotton. I love the color as absolutely everything about this nostalgic blanket. Great price for quality. I will be buying more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice and warm!
reviews.reviewText: This blanket is exactly as described. It is soft, warm, and light weight. I have it between the sheet and bedspread, and it is perfect for cold winter nights.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars In love with this blanket
reviews.reviewText: This blanket is perfect, soft and light. I put it between my top sheet and comforter. It adds to the warmth or easy to use without the comforter when I don’t want to be as warm. I have already shared the link with friends because I was so impressed’

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cozy and adds texture
reviews.reviewText: I bought the twin size and wish I was a little longer. But it adds texture to my bed and it’s actually pretty cozy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very nice quality blanket. The stitching is very good and the color is as pictured. The blanket is warm without being overly warm if that makes sense. I would definitely recommend this blanket.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It’s a great size. It’s very nice and perfect for my needs. I run hot so I really don’t do well with anything that is too heavy. It’s the perfect weight. The waffle design is really nice too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It’s ok but not as described
reviews.reviewText: I wanted a waffle weave and this has a waffle pattern. It is slick to the touch like a nylon or polyester. Just not what I expected, but it is a nice blanket. I will return.
